Title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
Overview: A card shark and his unwillingly-enlisted friends need to make a lot of cash quick after losing a sketchy poker match. To do this they decide to pull a heist on a small-time gang who happen to be operating out of the flat next door.
Keywords: ambush, alcohol, shotgun, tea, joint, machismo, cocktail, rifle, marijuana, cockney accent, pot smoking, hatchet, antique, cardsharp, anger, carjacking, piano, strip show, high stakes
production_companies: Handmade Films Ltd., Summit Entertainment, PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, SKA Films, The Steve Tisch Company
Cast: Jason Flemyng, Dexter Fletcher, Nick Moran
